# Security Policy

## Supported Versions

| Version | Supported          |
| ------- | ------------------ |
| 2.5.2   | :white_check_mark: |
| 2.5.1   | :white_check_mark: |
| < 2.5   | :x:                |

## Reporting a Vulnerability

If you discover any security related issues, please email security@securitgroup.com instead of using the issue tracker.
